summary: The diff implements a comprehensive UI redesign with sophisticated dark theme, premium visual treatments, refined typography, and polished animations. All 10 requirements (REQ-116 through REQ-125) show evidence of implementation across multiple files including color system overhaul, typography updates, component redesigns with enhanced styling, loading states, spacing refinements, ambient animations, and settings improvements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added next-themes ThemeProvider integration with class attribute and dark mode enablement in App.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention implementing theme provider or system theme support. Only dark mode color palette was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented useCountAnimation custom hook for number counting animations
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-124 requests smooth number counting animations, creating a separate reusable hook goes beyond the specified implementation approach.

hallucinated_features.description: Added love emoji in footer attribution text
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding emoji to footer or modifying footer content beyond existing structure.
